document_data.name: School of the Mage of Shadowdale
document_data.source: [[City of Delights|City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''School of the Mage of Shadowdale''' was a small school in [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Activities:
This school was run by the foreign [[wizard]] [[Elfinster]]. Students accepted at the school could learn magical [[spell]]s, or, if they lacked magical ability, they could learn to recognize a specific spell being cast based upon the caster's gestures and speech.

Though Elfinster could be quite eccentric, his prices were reasonable and he was a proficient teacher.

[[Scroll]]s could also be purchased here.
document_data.Inhabitants: Elfinster owned and operated this school.
